project.heading: Approved Used Vehicle Search
project.brief: To build Land Rovers first approved used vehicles website for over 1000 dealers worldwide.
project.requirements:
• Desktop and tablet
  • Landing page with vehicle and model selection
  • Advanced search filter
  • Vehicle information
  • Vehicle List - listing all vehicles for sale in list or grid layout
  • Vehicle details page with dealer information
